metadata.title: CVE-2020-7060 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: When using certain mbstring functions to convert multibyte encodings, inPHP versions 7.2.x below 7.2.27, 7.3.x below 7.3.14 and 7.4.x below 7.4.2it is possible to supply data that will cause functionmbfl_filt_conv_big5_wchar to read past the allocated buffer. This may leadto information disclosure or crash.

criterions.comment: php5: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
